original: Edelsteen, Harry Oskar, provinsialläkare, Karlshamn, f. 16/3/90 i Brun-flo, Jämtl. 1., av Otto Johan E. o. Maria Olivia Wretlindh. G. 33 m. Ruth Hildegard Olsson. Barn: Monica f. 43. — Stud:ex. 10, med. kand. i Lund 13, med. lic. där 19. Stud. lungtub. i Davos 21-22. Tf. und:läk. v. Söderby sjukh. 14, v. Långbro o. Katarina sjukh. 15, e. läk. i Fränsta o. Älvsby distr. 16, andre und:läk. v. Malmö allm. sjukh. med. avd. 17, e. läk. i Strömsunds distr, 18-19, prov:-läk. där 19-20, järnv:läk. 20-21, div. förordn. s. provrläk. 22, e. prov:läk. i Ovanåkers distr. 22-25, prov:läk. i Håby distr. 25-32, i Karlshamns distr. sed. 32, läk. v. kronohäktet i Karlshamn 32-37. Led. av las idirekt.
translated: Edelsteen, Harry Oskar, provincial physician, Karlshamn, born on March 16, 1890 in Brun-flo, Jämtland County, son of Otto Johan E. and Maria Olivia Wretlindh. Married in 1933 to Ruth Hildegard Olsson. Children: Monica born in 1943. He graduated from high school in 1910, received his Bachelor of Medicine in Lund in 1913, and his Medical License there in 1919. He studied pulmonary tuberculosis in Davos from 1921-1922. He worked as a temporary assistant physician at Söderby Hospital in 1914, at Långbro and Katarina Hospital in 1915, as medical officer in Fränsta and Älvsby districts in 1916, as second assistant physician at Malmö General Hospital medical department in 1917, as medical officer in Strömsunds district from 1918-1919, as provincial physician there from 1919-1920, as railway physician from 1920-1921, and had various appointments as provincial physician in 1922. He served as provincial physician in Ovanåkers district from 1922-1925, in Håby district from 1925-1932, in Karlshamns district since 1932, and as a physician at the Kronohäktet in Karlshamn from 1932-1937. He was also a member of the board of directors of the hospital.

memberOf.name: Board of Directors of the Hospital
